attributes.action: Make councils to trim back hedges and trees by road signs and junctions more often
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Overgrown trees and hedges by junctions have caused accidents. Also people who drive on roads that they don't know well have got speeding tickets because the sign telling what the max speed is covered by overgrown greenery. It's about time the councils either trim them back more often or get rid of them all together
